 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשָׁה‎</span>] **verb** ==be hard, severe, fierce== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשָׁה‎</span> ***be severe***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***be hard, dry***, III. ***endure, struggle against, severity***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְשָׁא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be hard, difficult***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְשִׁי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשְׁיָה‎</span> adjective ***hard***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽשְׁתָה‎</span> [[1Sam.5.7|1Sam 5:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשָׁ֑תָה‎</span> [[Gen.49.7|Gen 49:7]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְשֶׁה‎</span> [[Deut.1.17|Deut 1:17]]; [[Deut.15.18|Deut 15:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּ֫קֶשׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.19.44|2Sam 19:44]] — 

**1.** ***be hard, difficult*** [[Deut.1.17|Deut 1:17]] (of a legal case; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> comparative). 

**2.** ***be hard, severe***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלֵינוּ‎</span>[[1Sam.5.7|1Sam 5:7]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, in judgement); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְעֵינֶ֑ךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִק‎</span>. [[Deut.15.18|Deut 15:18]] ***it shall not be hard in thine eyes*** (seem a severe trial, an injustice); of wrath [[Gen.49.7|Gen 49:7]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ֑ז‎</span>); of fierce words [[2Sam.19.44|2Sam 19:44]]. **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְשֶׁה‎</span> [[Isa.8.21|Isa 8:21]] ***hardly bestead, hard pressed.*** **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּקַשׁ בְּלִדְתָּהּ‎</span> [[Gen.35.16|Gen 35:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***she made hard in her bearing*** (had severe labour). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְשָׁה‎</span> [[Exod.13.15|Exod 13:15]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶּקֶשׁ‎</span> [[2Chr.36.13|2Chr 36:13]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּקְשׁוּ‎</span> [[Jer.7.26|Jer 7:26]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהַקְשֹׁתָהּ‎</span> [[Gen.35.17|Gen 35:17]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְשֶׁה‎</span> [[Prov.28.14|Prov 28:14]]; [[Prov.29.1|Prov 29:1]] — 

**1.** ***make difficult, difficulty:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְשָׁה לְשַׁלְּחֵנוּ‎</span> [[Exod.13.15|Exod 13:15]] Pharaoh ***made difficulty about sending us away***; of travail [[Gen.35.17|Gen 35:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; as **Pi\`el**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקְשִׁיתָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁאוֺל‎</span> [[2Kgs.2.10|2Kgs 2:10]] ***thou hast made hard to ask***, asked a hard thing. 

**2.** ***make severe, burdensome***, yoke imposed by king [[1Kgs.12.4|1Kgs 12:4]] = [[2Chr.10.4|2Chr 10:4]]. 

**3. a.** ***make hard, stiff, stubborn***, figurative of obstinacy: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּקְשׁוּ אֶתעָֿרְפָּם‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.14|2Kgs 17:14]] ***they stiffened their neck***, so [[Jer.7.26|Jer 7:26]]; [[Jer.17.23|Jer 17:23]]; [[Jer.19.15|Jer 19:15]]; [[Deut.10.16|Deut 10:16]]; [[2Chr.30.8|2Chr 30:8]]; [[2Chr.36.13|2Chr 36:13]]; [[Neh.9.16|Neh 9:16]]; [[Neh.9.17|Neh 9:17]]; [[Neh.9.29|Neh 9:29]]; [[Prov.29.1|Prov 29:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתַּֿקְשׁוּ לְבַבְכֶם‎</span> [[Ps.95.8|Ps 95:8]], compare [[Prov.28.14|Prov 28:14]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַקְשֶׁה אֶתלֵֿב פ‎</span> [[Exod.7.3|Exod 7:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתרֿוחוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.2.30|Deut 2:30]], 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***shew stubborness*** [[Job.9.4|Job 9:4]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>]).
